result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shawn S Kelley in court.  Attorney Obi Uzowulu in court for Shawn S Kelley.  Attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for State of Wisconsin. Called @ 3:24 pm. Appearances made. Matter before the court for 6th status on 21CM468 and 1st status on 22CF496. Record by Attorney Uzowulu who has received global offer that Defendant wishes to accept. Asks for plea and sentencing date as to both files. Court sets as requested.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

records.addlTxt: State's Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Timelines
Not guilty plea entered and trial reserved.

Defendant in court with attorney Obi Uzowulu. ADA TenHaken appears for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant advised of right to preliminary hearing and is waiving. Matter bound over for trial. Information filed. Not guilty  pleas entered, trial reserved.
Status conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Shawn S Kelley in court with Attorney Obi Uzowulu  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by ADA JJ Crawford. Called @ 4:18 p.m. Appearances made. Matter was before the Court for 5th status on 21CM468 and initial appearance on 22CF496. Atty. Uzowulu goes over the charges and penalties in new complaint and requests preliminary hearing outside time limits. The misdemeanor file is to track with the felony case. Court in recess.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Cash bail of $1500 shall be deposited.

BOND TO COVER 22GF922 & 21CM468

Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Any prescribed medication is to be taken within the terms / limits of the prescription.  Defendant will not possess any firearms, ammunition or other weapons.  NO VIOLENT CONTACT WITH S.R.W.  "No violent contact" includes threats through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person or through a third party.  Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
Notice to Person Posting Bond Money

Defendant Shawn S Kelley in court, in custody by video. Andrew Herrmann appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Grace Hagerman appeared specially. Defendant does not qualify for SPD. Total cash bond set with same prior conditions. Minutes filed.
Hearing scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
